constituent: technique, flowers, rising cloud, two, elbow, wall
heisigStory: The secret technique of making a rising cloud of smoke turn into a bouquet of flowers is shown here.
koohiiStory1: Imagine an old Kung-fu movie: "Try my rising cloud flower technique!!!" smash pow crack!! .
koohiiStory2: One technique to smoke weed is to vaporize it and inhale those rising clouds to create a stronger effect.
myStory: kĩ thuật. nói nở hoa là một kĩ thuật. hai tay nở hoa
